question: Indian Railways is expected to meet all its energy consumption needs by which year?
explanation:
Indian Railways organised a discussion with key stake holders under the chairmanship of Minister of Railways and Commerce & Industry Piyush Goyal.
Indian Railways has developed a plan for installing solar plants of 20 GW capacity along its vacant land by 2030. It is also expected to meet all energy consumption needs of over 33 billion units by 2030. This will also contribute towards National Solar Mission while becoming a net zero carbon emitting Railway by 2030.
